en: I received around 300 New Year's cards, just about as many as I had sent out.
zh: 我收到了大约300张新年贺卡，和我寄出去的数量差不多。

en: I'm Tom's coach.

en: This is Tom's mom, Mary.

en: I'm Mary, Tom's mom.

en: Even a cheap frying pan will last a long time if you treat it well.

en: That's the bus that goes to the station.

en: This guitar has one broken string.

en: When is the deadline?

en: Everyone had one as though it were a matter of course, but sure enough they were expensive.
zh: 每个人都好像理所当然地拥有一个，但果然很贵。

en: I have mixed feelings about the sumptuous renovations at the store where I have so many memories.
zh: 我对这家商店的豪华装修感到五味杂陈，我对这家店有很多回忆。

en: Tom's singing voice flowed out of the radio.

en: There are lots of things to do in Boston.

en: Are you sure you don't care?

en: Don't get angry, OK?

en: I feel that way, too.

en: You're overthinking things.

en: You're reading too much into the situation.

en: It looks easy, but it's pretty exhausting.

en: Don't wake him. I've just put him to sleep. It's not easy getting this child to sleep.
zh: 别吵醒他。我刚哄他睡着。哄这个孩子睡觉不容易。

en: Don't tease me!

en: I'm waiting at the traffic lights.

en: Wow, there's all sorts of different vending machines.

en: I guess it's up to the customer, but Tabasco sauce really completes the dish.
zh: 我觉得这取决于顾客，不过辣椒仔酱确实能让这道菜更完美。

en: There's always a lot of shaking around this part of the track, huh?
zh: 赛道的这一段总是很颠簸，是吧？

en: Even though it's half off, it's still expensive and doesn't feel like a good deal.
zh: 即使半价，还是觉得很贵，不划算。

en: The laptop really became cheap.
zh: 这台笔记本电脑真是变得很便宜了。

en: He's got the dignity of a boss, hasn't he?
zh: 他很有老板的风度，不是吗？

en: If you need anything, please ask him.
zh: 如果你需要什么，请问他。

en: Where are we going to put my mother's belongings?

en: Why don't we get together for lunch tomorrow?

en: "Would you like something to eat?" "No, thank you. I'll eat something at home."
zh: “你想吃点什么吗？” “不用了，谢谢。我回家再吃。”

en: I forgot my key and locked myself out of the house.
zh: 我忘了带钥匙，把自己锁在外面了。

en: What made you decide to move into this neighborhood?

en: That car belongs to my neighbor.
zh: 那辆车是我邻居的。

en: When are you planning to come back?
zh: 你打算什么时候回来？

en: I have two older brothers. They're both studying abroad.
zh: 我有两个哥哥，他们都在国外留学。

en: Would you mind if I play some music?
zh: 我放点音乐你介意吗？

en: I prefer reading books to watching movies.
zh: 我更喜欢看书，不喜欢看电影。

en: I go to school in Tokyo.
zh: 我在东京上学。

en: I would like to leave work early today if possible.
zh: 如果可以的话，我今天想早点下班。

en: My family means more to me than my life does.
zh: 我的家人比我的生命更重要。

en: My girlfriend broke up with me last night.
zh: 我女朋友昨晚和我分手了。

en: I'm not sure how many hours it took to finish the report.
zh: 我不确定完成这份报告花了多少个小时。

en: My father won't pay for my college education.
zh: 我爸爸不肯支付我的大学学费。

en: I'm trying to study, but I can't concentrate.
zh: 我正在努力学习，但我无法集中注意力。

en: Are there going to be fireworks and stuff at that festival?
zh: 那个节日会有烟花之类的东西吗？

en: I wonder if that festival will have a ton of good food?
zh: 不知道那个节日会不会有很多好吃的？

en: It was a meaningful experience for me to get a small taste of the loneliness people feel when they've made the now-popular decision to leave their families and work elsewhere.
zh: 能稍微体会到那些离开家人去外地工作的人所感受到的孤独，对我来说是一次很有意义的经历。

en: During that time, speaking of my son, he had injured his leg, and, although he was looking forward to summer vacation, he had surgery and spent the whole time in the hospital.
zh: 那段时间，说起我儿子，他腿受伤了，虽然他很期待暑假，但他做了手术，整个假期都在医院里度过。

en: When I get home, I think I will do some cleaning.
zh: 我回家后，我想我会打扫一下卫生。

en: We practice soccer every Saturday.
zh: 我们每个星期六都练习足球。

en: I have a fever, so I won't go to school today.
zh: 我发烧了，所以今天不去学校了。

en: I have a fever, so I'll be absent from school today.
zh: 我发烧了，所以今天我要请假不去学校。

en: I have a fever, so I won't be at school today.
zh: 我发烧了，所以今天不在学校。

en: I use a dictionary when I don't understand the meaning of words.
zh: 我不懂词语的意思时，会用字典。

en: I knew that would happen sooner or later.
zh: 我就知道那件事迟早会发生。

en: I'm going all out for the final week.
zh: 最后一周我要全力以赴。

en: Tom named his son Sami after the Tatoeba character.
zh: 汤姆以Tatoeba的角色给他的儿子取名为萨米。

en: That was a good show.
zh: 那是个不错的节目。

en: No one believed Tom's story.
zh: 没人相信汤姆的故事。

en: This intrigue will soon be exposed.
zh: 这个阴谋很快就会被揭穿。

en: Bikes feel sluggish in high winds.
zh: 逆风骑自行车感觉很费劲。

en: Stop picking on people.
zh: 别欺负人。

en: Stop bullying people.
zh: 别霸凌别人。

en: There are too many things that need to be done.
zh: 有太多事情需要做了。

en: Even at half price, these clothes seem expensive.
zh: 即使半价，这些衣服看起来还是很贵。

en: Underhandedness really gets on my nerves.
zh: 卑鄙的手段真让我生气。

en: This is the current trend.
zh: 这是现在的潮流。

en: I just made this.
zh: 我刚做的。

en: A baby is sleeping in the cot.
zh: 一个婴儿正在婴儿床上睡觉。

en: No matter how good his grades are, he struggles to keep his foot out of his mouth.
zh: 无论他成绩多好，他总是祸从口出。

en: If necessary, I'll investigate it.
zh: 如有必要，我会调查这件事。

en: He nods as if to say "of course".
zh: 他点点头，好像在说“当然”。

en: Before the sale, they raise prices to make the discounts seem larger.
zh: 在促销之前，他们会提高价格，使折扣看起来更大。

en: So as to leave no room for doubt, I refused in the strongest terms.
zh: 为了不留下任何疑问，我用最强烈的措辞拒绝了。

en: A beta version has been released, so I'll try it right away.
zh: 测试版已经发布了，所以我马上试试。

en: I'm thankful for miso soup with extra veggies.
zh: 我很感谢这碗加了蔬菜的味噌汤。

en: I want to be able to read books faster.
zh: 我希望能够更快地阅读书籍。

en: I want to be able to read books more quickly.
zh: 我希望能够更快地阅读书籍。

en: I'd like to be able to read books faster.
zh: 我希望能更快地阅读书籍。

en: I want to eat some local food where we're sightseeing.
zh: 我想在我们观光的地方吃一些当地的食物。

en: Let's take a short break here.
zh: 我们在这里休息一下吧。

en: It won't be a problem at all.

en: I'll do that job.
zh: 我会做那份工作。

en: I'll carry that luggage.
zh: 我会搬那个行李。

en: This is too dangerous.
zh: 这太危险了。

en: I'd like to buy a house, but I can't afford to.
zh: 我想买房子，但我买不起。

en: I'm not trustworthy enough to be asked for advice.
zh: 我不太值得信任，所以没人会向我征求意见。

en: I tried to open the door.
zh: 我试图打开门。

en: When I turned on the air conditioner and toaster oven, the circuit breaker tripped.
zh: 当我打开空调和烤箱时，跳闸了。

en: I started cycling to lose weight, and then I fell in love with it.
zh: 我开始骑自行车是为了减肥，然后我爱上了它。

en: I started cycling for weight loss, and then I fell in love with it.
zh: 我开始骑自行车是为了减肥，然后我爱上了它。

en: I remembered a song that I had often listened to as a middle schooler, and I sang it softly to myself.
zh: 我想起了一首我中学时经常听的歌，我轻轻地哼唱起来。

en: Do you remember last night?
zh: 你还记得昨晚吗？

en: Is there a need to write it down?
zh: 有必要写下来吗？

en: Here, a slight smile.
zh: 这里，一丝微笑。

en: It's so unnatural that I'm laughing.
zh: 太不自然了，我都要笑出来了。

en: Today is a beautiful sunny day and I feel good.
zh: 今天阳光明媚，我感觉很好。

en: It's a sunny day today and I feel great.
zh: 今天天气晴朗，我感觉很棒。

en: Was the culprit found?
zh: 犯人找到了吗？

en: My hand gets tired with the heavy phone.
zh: 手机太重了，我的手都累了。

en: Nice. That's really cool.
zh: 不错啊。真酷。

en: A contradiction has immediately appeared.
zh: 立刻就出现了矛盾。

en: It looks like it would taste worse than prison food.
zh: 看起来比监狱的食物还难吃。

en: It's only the shops I often go to that go out of business.
zh: 倒闭的总是我去的店。

en: The fishing minigame is popular.
zh: 钓鱼小游戏很受欢迎。

en: Don't worry, we still have a chance.
zh: 别担心，我们还有机会。

en: Sometimes I want to eat stew.
zh: 有时候我想吃炖菜。

en: Sometimes I feel like eating stew.
zh: 有时候我有点想吃炖菜。

en: I hum a tune as I clean up.
zh: 我一边哼着小曲一边打扫卫生。

en: I'm worried something bad might happen, so I'm gonna go see what's going on.
zh: 我担心会发生什么不好的事情，所以我要去看看发生了什么。

en: Five more minutes! Please wait five more minutes!
zh: 再给我五分钟！请再等五分钟！

en: I'll think about my diet after I eat this.
zh: 吃完这个我再考虑减肥。

en: I think I've heard this before.
zh: 我觉得我以前听过这个。

en: I've been obsessed with baumkuchen lately.
zh: 我最近迷上了年轮蛋糕。

en: Its features are good, but the design is where it fails.
zh: 它的功能很好，但设计是它的败笔。

en: And what guarantee is there that you won't cover up the evidence?
zh: 你有什么保证不会掩盖证据？

en: This is so annoying. I'm getting spam again.
zh: 真烦人。我又收到垃圾邮件了。

en: Thank you. This will help very much.
zh: 谢谢你。这会很有帮助。

en: Open-world games are fun, but I get tired of them.
zh: 开放世界游戏很有趣，但我玩久了会觉得累。

en: I think you should talk to each other based on the data.
zh: 我认为你们应该根据数据互相交流。

en: If you aren't feeling well, you should rest.
zh: 如果你感觉不舒服，就应该休息。

en: My teacher, exasperated, now shifts his eyes upon me.
zh: 我的老师，恼火地，现在把目光转向我。

en: Whenever I return home, my cat comes out to welcome me in.
zh: 每当我回到家，我的猫都会出来迎接我。

en: It's gotten warmer out, so the wind feels nice.
zh: 天气变暖和了，所以风吹起来很舒服。

en: Through the dirty window, I see the city soaked in the rain.
zh: 透过脏兮兮的窗户，我看到城市浸泡在雨中。

en: I think I'd be able to get something within budget if I went with these specs.
zh: 如果我选择这些配置，我想我能买到预算内的东西。

en: This parking lot is a gathering place for cats.
zh: 这个停车场是猫咪的聚集地。

en: I feel like I'm being watched from somewhere.
zh: 我感觉好像从某个地方被监视着。

en: The number of people who play video games on PC is increasing.
zh: 在电脑上玩游戏的人数正在增加。

en: If we can contain the opponent's best player, we have a shot at winning.
zh: 如果我们能限制住对方的最佳球员，我们就有机会获胜。

en: They will figure out the location from the surveillance footage.
zh: 他们会从监控录像中找出位置。

en: I like this detergent because it lathers well.
zh: 我喜欢这款洗衣液，因为它起泡性很好。

en: Now that you say it, yeah, I feel like that, too.
zh: 你这么一说，是啊，我也感觉是这样。

en: I feel like it's gotten faster after the update.
zh: 我感觉更新后速度变快了。

en: Which do you want, peanut butter or strawberry jelly?
zh: 你想要花生酱还是草莓果酱？

en: I can feel the sweetness spreading inside my mouth. I feel like I'm going to get addicted.
zh: 我能感觉到甜味在我的嘴里蔓延。我觉得我要上瘾了。

en: I think you should stop making only yourself responsible for everything.
zh: 我认为你应该停止独自承担一切责任。

en: I feel good just by watching someone get a massage.
zh: 光是看着别人按摩，我就感觉很舒服。

en: I ran a long distance for the first time in a while and now my legs are shaking.
zh: 我有一段时间没跑长距离了，现在我的腿在发抖。

en: The structure of the human body can be thought of in the same way.
zh: 人体结构可以用同样的方式来思考。

en: Young children often mistake fiction for reality.
zh: 年幼的孩子经常把虚构当成现实。

en: I've been using the A/C every day, so the electric bill this month is probably going to be high as fuck.
zh: 我每天都在用空调，所以这个月的电费可能会非常高。

en: There's nothing really impactful about this commercial, but I remember it well.
zh: 这个广告没有什么真正有影响力的东西，但我记得很清楚。

en: When I see someone eating hayashi rice, I want to eat it, too.
zh: 当我看到别人吃烩饭的时候，我也想吃。

en: They're failing to give off the impression of seeming scary but actually being a good person.
zh: 他们没能给人一种看起来很可怕但实际上是个好人的印象。

en: I clear my lungs of the smoke lingering inside, and turn my eyes to a park shrouded in the dark.
zh: 我清了清肺里残留的烟雾，然后把目光转向笼罩在黑暗中的公园。

en: I'm looking for a laptop that'll be good for my parents to use.
zh: 我在找一台适合我父母使用的笔记本电脑。

en: Carrots, onions, potatoes, beef... what else do you want to put in?
zh: 胡萝卜、洋葱、土豆、牛肉……你还想放什么？

en: Though I say it has a cozy feel, it's really rather isolated.
zh: 虽然我说它有舒适的感觉，但实际上它相当偏僻。

en: There's a single supermarket in the apartment complex which adjoins the bus stop, a few minutes' walk away.
zh: 公寓大楼里有一个超市，与公共汽车站相连，步行几分钟就到。

en: I have the feeling that the celebrities who appear in cup ramen commercials don't eat things like cup ramen.
zh: 我感觉出现在方便面广告中的名人不会吃方便面之类的东西。

en: It rained, but not enough to be called a storm.
zh: 下雨了，但还不足以被称为暴风雨。

en: These kinds of mushrooms are poisonous.
zh: 这些种类的蘑菇是有毒的。

en: He bought a lottery ticket and won five million dollars.
zh: 他买了一张彩票，中了五百万美元。

en: I saw this scary monster under my bed.
zh: 我看到一个可怕的怪物在我的床底下。

en: I woke up with a cat sleeping next to my feet.
zh: 我醒来时，一只猫睡在我的脚边。

en: Your husband is a lucky man.
zh: 你丈夫真幸运。

en: This morning was tough because of my hangover.
zh: 今天早上很难受，因为我宿醉了。

en: Give it another look over. It'll be a lot better if you do.
zh: 再仔细检查一遍。如果你这样做，会好很多。

en: Even though I'm getting older, I really want to get better at using new technology.
zh: 即使我年纪越来越大，我真的很想更好地使用新技术。

en: Did you like city life?
zh: 你喜欢城市生活吗？

en: The kid is temperamental.
zh: 这孩子喜怒无常。

en: Well, I think that is correct, though.
zh: 嗯，我认为那是正确的，虽然。

en: I've got to sleep early today.
zh: 我今天得早点睡觉。

en: Making poor comparisons will just make your explanation more confusing.
zh: 做出糟糕的比较只会让你的解释更加混乱。

en: The "buy and replace" sale is an opportunity to buy things at great prices.
zh: “以旧换新”促销活动是以优惠价格购买商品的好机会。

en: Oh, is that so...
zh: 哦，是这样啊……

en: Oh, is that so?
zh: 哦，是这样啊？

en: Oh, is that right?
zh: 哦，是这样吗？

en: Sorry to bother you this late at night.
zh: 这么晚打扰你真不好意思。

en: Shit, I have no idea what they're saying.
zh: 靠，我完全不知道他们在说什么。
